title: How Do We Get Them To Come Out and Play...With Quality!
description:
I answer a Question from the comment section of a previous video, with help from Tao de Ching, Dale Carnegie and Shunryu Suzuki. 

Dr. McWatt's Dissertation on the MOQ
https://cdn.website-editor.net/90e0cb600d8146f9af85b88f0c2f8fb2/files/uploaded/A.McWatt-PhD%2520Thesis%2520June%25202011%2520pp.pdf
